title: Shade Blocks
body:
A particular portions in a page of text can be differentiated/highlighted using these shades functionalities. For example Blue / Green / Purple shade blocks etc…

You can select the particular text which needs to be highlighted and press the “Blue Shade” button. Each shades are pictorially shown below
